name: Ancient Brass Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
oracle_text:
When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.
+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.
−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.
Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Wand of Wonder
oracle_text:
{4}, {T}: Roll a d20. Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card, then shuffles the rest into their library. You may cast up to X instant and/or sorcery spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
1-9 | X is one
10-19 | X is two.
20 | X is three.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Elder Brain
oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Citadel Siege
oracle_text:
As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
• Dragons — At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

name: Palace Siege
oracle_text:
As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Dragons — At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Outpost Siege
oracle_text:
As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, Outpost Siege deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Monastery Siege
oracle_text:
As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card.
• Dragons — Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

name: Frontier Siege
oracle_text:
As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

name: Crux of Fate
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
flavor_text: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

name: Dragonfly Pilot
oracle_text:
Whenever Dragonfly Pilot enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Dragonfly Suit into your hand.
Dragonfly Pilot crews vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

name: Mothrider Cavalry
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you have no other creature cards in hand or if the only other creature cards in your hand are named Mothrider Cavalry.
Flying
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

name: Better Offer
oracle_text: Put a random creature card with mana value X or less from target opponent's library onto the battlefield under your control. It perpetually has base power and toughness X/X and perpetually gains ward {1}

name: Kami of Mourning
oracle_text: Whenever Kami of Mourning enters the battlefield, target creature you control or creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "Whenever a creature you control with greater mana value than this card dies, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

name: Kami of Bamboo Groves
oracle_text:
When Kami of Bamboo Groves enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
Channel—{2}{G}, Discard Kami of Bamboo Groves: Conjure two cards named Forest into your hand.

name: Forceful Cultivator
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are no land cards in your hand.
When Forceful Cultivator enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Foundry Beetle
oracle_text:
First strike
Equipped creature has first strike.
At the beginning of your upkeep, a random artifact in your hand perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."
Reconfigure {R}

name: Fragment Reality
oracle_text: Exile target nontoken artifact, creature, or enchantment. Its controller puts a random creature card with lesser mana value from their library onto the battlefield tapped.

name: Kami of Transmutation
oracle_text:
When Kami of Transmutation enters or leaves the battlefield, choose one —
• Each permanent card in your hand perpetually becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.
• Each permanent card in your hand perpetually becomes an enchantment in addition to its other types.

name: Saiba Syphoner
oracle_text:
Flash
This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are no instant or sorcery cards in your hand.
When Saiba Syphoner enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Boseiju Pathlighter
oracle_text: When Boseiju Pathlighter enters the battlefield, draft a card from Boseiju Pathlighter's spellbook.

name: Bellowsbreath Ogre
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 1
Whenever Bellowsbreath Ogre attacks, it deals damage equal to its intensity to any target, then perpetually increase its intensity by 1.

name: Experimenta Pilot
Undercity Plunder
oracle_text: Target opponent discards a card. Then they may discard an additional card. If they don't, conjure a duplicate of a random card from their library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

name: Junkyard Scrapper
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, exile a random nonland artifact card with lesser mana value from your library. You may cast that card until end of turn.

name: Soul Servitude
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a nontoken creature. When they do, you may discard a card. If you do, conjure a duplicate of the sacrifices creature into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

name: Runaway Growth
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 1
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional amount of {G} equal to Runaway Growth's intensity, then perpetually increase its intensity by 1.

name: Futurist Spellthief
oracle_text:
Flash
When Futurist Spellthief enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of target spell into your hand. That card perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

name: Holographic Double
oracle_text: {U}, Exile Holographic Double from your hand: Choose a creature card in your hand. Conjure a duplicate of it into your hand.

name: Swarm Saboteur
Painful Bond
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then cards in your hand with mana value 3 or greater perpetually gain "When you cast this spell, you lose 1 life."

name: Jukai Liberator
oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{G}
Whenever Jukai Liberator deals combat damage to a player, choose land or nonland. Seek a permanent card of the chosen type.

name: Molten Impact
oracle_text: Molten Impact deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage was dealt this way, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, Molten Impact deals damage equal to the excess to target creature or planeswalker.

name: Consuming Oni
oracle_text:
Flying, Menace
At the beginning of your end step, a random nonland card in your hand perpetually gains "When you cast this spell, you lose 3 life."

name: Artillery Enthusiast
oracle_text: When Artillery Enthusiast enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, seek a card with mana value equal to that card's mana value.

name: Semblance Scanner
oracle_text:
Whenever Semblance Scanner or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, if it's not a token, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand.
Reconfigure {1}

name: Chronicler of Worship
oracle_text:
When Chronicler of Worship enters the battlefield, put a random Shrine card from among the top seven cards of your library into your hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast." Then shuffle.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Imperial Blademaster
oracle_text:
Double strike
Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, draft a card from Imperial Blademaster's spellbook.

name: Inchblade Companion
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever Inchblade Companion becomes attached to a creature, create a token that's a copy of Inchblade Companion, except it doesn't have this ability. This ability triggers only once each turn.

name: Forgeborn Phoenix
oracle_text:
Flying
Equipped creature has flying.
Whenever Forgeborn Phoenix or equipped creature dies, it perpetually gains "Whenever an equipped creature you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."
